sql-script.name: script
sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_news_category ( id char(32) not null, parentid char(32), domain int not null, name varchar(32) not null, text varchar(32) not null, viewtemplate tinyint not null, mark tinyint not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, description varchar(256), oorder int not null, primary key(id), unique (name), unique (parentid, text), unique (oorder) );

create table sf_news ( id char(32) not null, categoryid char(32) not null, domain int not null, cname varchar(32), status tinyint not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, topic varchar(128) not null, keywords varchar(128), author varchar(32), source varchar(32), recommendation int not null, recommendationdate timestamp, recommendationduration int not null, imagemark bit not null, contentmark int not null, comments int not null, lastcommentdate timestamp, allowcomments bit not null, indexed bit not null, views int not null, description varchar(256), content clob, oorder int not null, primary key(id), unique (oorder) );
create table sf_news_comment ( id char(32) not null, parentid char(32), contentid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, comment clob not null, primary key(id) );
